meanings.sent2: He was playing with his toy car.
meanings.sent3: The cat was pretending to be a lion.
meanings.sent4: The old house was a silent witness to many stories.
meanings.sent5: The sun was shining brightly in the sky.

meanings.definition: existed or occurred in the past
meanings.sent2: The was clock on the wall stopped.
meanings.sent3: The was rainstorm left puddles everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The was moon cast a soft glow over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The was tree stood tall and proud in the forest.
